comments.body:
It looks like this might be a `noarch: python` compatible package:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#building-noarch-packages

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@
build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv "
